item.title: HAPPY HALLOWEEN! SPOOKY SKELETON BODY PAINT - MCROFT07
item.description: I AM IN THE UK AND HAVE BEEN BLOCKED FROM USING IMGUR!!! I managed to get on here with a VPN but Imgur doesn't like Vpns so I might lose access again soon. IF you still want to follow me and see what I am doing please PLEASE find me on https://linktr.ee/mcroft07?utm_source=linktree_profile_share I HATE THE GOVERNMENTS TOO Faq: I use body paint and do these in a mirror No, it is not AI I just looked at an anatomical drawing of a skeleton and copied it I use professional body paint covers (pasties) this means I am not wearing a top but I am also not naked. I paint myself, I make the props myself, I film myself, and I also edit. This is my full time thing now (yayy) I paint these by looking in a mirror, with brushes, and paint It takes between 6-12 hours each Body painting myself is my hobby/passion I do own clothes It doesn’t tickle “Why don’t you just wear clothes” once again, body painting myself is my hobby/passion. I am painting my skin, I am not wearing a suit - but that does not mean I am naked. I know, even I think this is a ridiculous set of questions I have to constantly answer I did not go to art school, I am self taught. Talent gets you so far, but this is a learned skill. The paint isn’t edible (gross) I've been painting myself for 16 years. The 07 does not mean I was born in 2007, UK 7 is my shoe size No, I don't need help painting my back, I don't want to paint my back, I don't need to paint my back. (also gross) No, I don't need help washing it off. (also you are gross) If you want to see more I am MCroft07 on IG, twitter, Tiktok, YouTube I paint them live on twitch I like doing the lip syncs, they're fun for me while I paint them. I couldn’t care less if you think they’re cringe. I am cringe but I am free My tattoos on my ribs are from Tomb Raider - I am a big TR fan I do not have an OF but if you want to send me money THAT badly you can just tip my twitch account. Haha. The shower afterwards takes about 15 minutes, I use a regular sponge and shower gel. The reason why it can look different at the end is because I am wearing a wig, I promise you it is not a different person because the hair changed. While on this topic, if my eyes change colour it’s because I am wearing contact lenses. (Those with an IQ above 10… I know. Even I’m shocked the wig thing is a frequent comment). I use body paint. It doesn’t tickle, I am very ticklish and this is fine. I don’t have an allergic reaction to the paint, but if you do it, you should always do a patch test first I do not know where you can buy body paint in every country. I know in the UK it is available at FacePaintingshop.com. I use a plethora of different brands, it’s best to search for them yourself online. I don’t work in Hollywood, I don’t want to. I just want to improve my body painting for myself. I am English, not American. I do not go outside like this to scare people. 1, that would be very cold. 2, in this current age, everyone would take photos without me knowing and it would likely dox me :)))))) I’m not a sweaty person, but if I was this would be a lot more difficult. Thank you to those of you who came from Imgur to my Twitch channel! “What’s the point in painting yourself when you can wear clothes?” all my clothes are in the laundry, had to resort to this, tough life It would not be quicker to jump into a pool of paint - think of the drying time?! If you're still here I’m drinking Yorkshire tea out of my Twilight eclipse mug that I’ve had since I was 16 LOL I don’t care that I wash it off at the end, I get to reuse this canvas, we love a reduce, reuse, recycle queen. I am not the lady who did the Maneskin video, it’s a cool video and she slayed, but it isn’t me. I can promise you there is not *a man* painting these and I am pretending to paint myself. I am genuinely painting myself. I know a lot of you don’t like reading this faq because it is horrid to see that I have to answer all of these. Unfortunately I have noticed that when I don’t put in all the icky things then I get more gross comments and I just have to spend more time blocking people so it’s better to call it out. I just copy and paste it each time anyway.
item.dc:creator: MCroft07

item.title: Just a gentle reminder...
item.description: This is true at any time. Just mind your business. And if you are in the position to have to steal to eat, reminder that Wal-Mart made $169B in profit last year and a good number of their employees rely on SNAP to eat, instead of getting paid, you know...a thriving wage.

item.title: Happy Halloween! hahaha!!!!
item.description:
Follow @glass.housescomics for more comics. reddit thread from creator: https://www.reddit.com/r/comics/comments/1ol3ocq/real_horrors_oc/ Scroll down to get to the punchline! :) :) :)
Oh. That's the punchline. Yes, I set it up with very sarcastic emoticons. A cheap manipualtion that probably didn't mislead many of you. Maybe not a happy comic, but it's a reminder to doubledown on fighting against fascism. But on a happier note: Remember to hug you family, friends, pets… find joy where you can, even though there's so much evil in the world. We can all work together to fight against that evil. Hang in there, lovely people <3 Link/credit under the top image in case you missed it!

26 Imgur Creator Spotlight: @T1nkerHell made this cool dragon egg!
27 Man Tax: Milo Ventimiglia
“Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement; nothing can be done without hope.” - Helen Keller I try to keep my posts "good vibe zones". So, instead of finding the one thing in here you don't like and commenting only on that, also comment about something you DID like. Balance the negativity. Love you long time. So, I made a discord server. It's a relaxed environment where you can take/donate memes to the cause, play trivia twice a week, chat about lots of topics or about nothing at all. We also have Jack Box game night and are setting up movie night! Very laid back/relaxed vibe. Come hang with us. https://discord.gg/AWFV7FT3RQ I'm also on the imgcat server for updates & fun: https://discord.gg/TpjD37jgJ9 ***Also if you miss abbiistabbii's discord community good news! You can now find it here https://discord.gg/qeCygcnWy8 - where everyone's reconnecting, shitposting, and hanging out again*** https://ko-fi.com/mememuseumcurator Unable to work and pretty destitute. Feel free to leave me a tip. Those that have, y'all are the bee's knees. You've helped me so much. ***Tag me if you see an artist/creator you like whose work isn't getting seen as much as it should be! Or if you are an artist/creator and want me to post something of yours, DM me!

item.title: GovBrief Today #273
item.description: Trump isn't hiding the machine being built. Military orders today established a unit of nearly 25,000 troops to deploy as Quick Reaction Forces with a presence in each state for supposed unrest. The military has also attacked 14 boats in international waters while killing 61 people, but the Defense Department didn't send attorneys to brief Democrats on the legal justification. Those Democrats will be superfluous soon. Tonight, Trump demanded that Senate Republicans end the filibuster and give the GOP power to pass any bill with a simple majority, instead of the 60 votes required for most legislation. Get your local community squared away now, especially in areas where the state has refused to supplement federal food aid. Then reach out to your elected officials and ask how you can support their efforts. Notice you're seeing less news on social media? We track the data - you're right. Social media networks are suppressing news stories more every day. Want to stop missing what matters? Get every brief in your inbox, 7 nights a week. Data, images, searchable archive. Free and private at govbrief.today. #GovBriefToday #Resist Subscribe (It's Free!) - https://gbounacos.substack.com [1] https://go.govbrief.today/means-siblings-exit-whitehouse [2] https://go.govbrief.today/texas-same-sex-marriage [3] https://go.govbrief.today/trump-meme-arrest-longterm [4] https://go.govbrief.today/bessent-soybean-china-purchase [5] https://go.govbrief.today/trump-boat-briefing-democrats [6] https://go.govbrief.today/military-quick-response-memo [7] https://go.govbrief.today/snap-funding-emergency-order [8] https://go.govbrief.today/mifepristone-access-ruling [9] https://go.govbrief.today/durango-ice-protest-investigation [10] https://go.govbrief.today/military-lawyers-immigration-doj [11] https://go.govbrief.today/chicago-father-cancer-immigration [12] https://go.govbrief.today/trump-refugee-cuts-lowest [13] https://go.govbrief.today/student-loan-forgiveness-ideology [14] https://go.govbrief.today/trump-urges-filibuster-end [15] https://go.govbrief.today/classified-human-rights-probe [16] https://go.govbrief.today/orlando-air-traffic-problems [17] https://go.govbrief.today/doj-blm-investigation-started [18] https://go.govbrief.today/trump-officials-military-housing [19] https://go.govbrief.today/usda-slush-fund-transfer [20] https://go.govbrief.today/how-democrats-win Subscribe (It's Free!) - https://gbounacos.substack.com

item.title: Let's send food on Halloween to people in need
item.description:
Happy Halloween from TheFreePizzaDude and all the Pizza Angels! If you'd like to help a struggling Imgurian get groceries or a meal today there are 2 easy ways -
You can find a request for food in the comments, reply to them and then send a DM to get an order set up Or you can contribute to the Imgurian Meal Fund and we'll send the food for you!
Anonymous Angels have been such an amazing help for us to feed more people, we love you so much! https://www.paypal.me/TheFreePizzaDude https://ko-fi.com/thefreepizzadude
And here's how you'd send it yourself! Any questions as an Angel? Just shoot us a message! We'll be on this username until 8pm central
Kevin took a break from a hike to show you how it works for requests -
It's much easier for us to help requests in the US but we'll do our best to pick up requests from any country. Putting your country in your comment helps us match you to an Angel in your area
Any questions as a requestor? Just leave a comment! We'll have helpers on the post for 6 hours
16,059 meals since we started 1,161 grocery orders sent 6 more hours to help as many people as we can Let's get it going! ... Today's Meal Tally 240 1st, 2nd, 3rd and 4th by @OP 305 5th, 6th, 7th and 8th by Pizza Angel @WafflesOfMassDeliciousness 330 9th by Pizza Angel @WafflesOfMassDeliciousness 345 10th, 11th, 12th and 13th by @OP 425 14th by Pizza Angel @crasemana 435 15th, 16th, 17th and 18th by @OP 515 19th and 20th by Pizza Angel @WafflesOfMassDeliciousness 530 21st by Pizza Angel @pandaSloppy 605 22nd, Michael Jordan and Kobe Bryant by Pizza Angel @pot314 610 25th and 26th by Pizza Angel @sesamesnapsinhalf 615 27th by Pizza Angel Meisa1291 640 28th and 29th by Pizza Angel @meisa1291 720 30th, 31st, 32nd and 33rd by @OP 800 34th by Pizza Angel @puppyfart ... Alright everyone that's it for OP Today we sent out 34 meals That's 16,083 meals since we started 1,161 grocery orders sent Well done everyone, see you next week!
item.dc:creator: TheFreePizzaDude
